charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) is one half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

abilities.name: Shichiseiken Slash
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) uses Shichiseiken Slash on one enemy dealing 25 piercing damage. Damage Benihisago deals to that enemy will be increased by 5 permanently. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Silence is Golden
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) targets one enemy stunning their physical and melee skills for 1 turn. Benihisago will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy permanently. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Benihisago
abilities.description: Using Benihisago Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. Benihisago and Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) Bashosen Flames will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently.

abilities.name: Shichiseiken Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
